name: Challenge full stack - JavaScript
description: Budget management application with token authentication developed with Express and MySql in the backend and vue for the frontend.

name: PHP expenses app
description: Web application to keep track of personal expenses which is developed under the model-view-controller pattern and has authentication by sessions, authorization by roles and integration of graphs.

name: First responsive page
description: Experimenting with responsive development and CSS animations using flex and grid for element positioning and the @keyframe rule for animations.
